name: I Need Fuel!
description:
My LudamDare 48 game jam!

ALT + F to go fullscreen

Z to see debug mode!

A and D to move

SPACE to jump

SHIFT to dash

LEFT MOUSE BUTTON to shoot

E to interact with objects

This is a game about how your car runs out of fuel and you have to journey deeper and deeper into a cave to find fuel!

I know I didn't interpret the theme too well so next time I hope to do better!
